title: How to Be Good at Assassin's Creed Brotherhood

steps.headline: Buy the best weapons you can at the blacksmith.
Find all the Romulus Lairs.
steps.description: After you do that go to the Golden wolf sign to get the best armor and weapon in the game.

steps.headline: Destroy Leonardo's War Machines.
steps.description: This is done by destroying the machine's blueprints and completing a challenge with the machine itself.

steps.headline: Burn all the Borgia towers.
steps.description: This is done by killing the Borgia Captain, climbing to the top of the tower, and igniting it.

steps.headline: Solve all of Subject 16's puzzles.
steps.description: After this you will appear in a red wireframe world. Just keep going to the end and collecting the items until a cutscene occurs.

steps.headline: Collect all of the feathers.
steps.description: This is done by purchasing a feather map, collecting the feather symbols, and putting all ten in the shiny box at the Tiber Island Hideout.

steps.headline: Collect all the flags.
steps.description: This is done by buying a flag map in each of the regions, collecting those symbols, and searching in the Lairs and War Machine Areas for them.

steps.headline: Get gold on all of the Animus Challenges.

text: Watch the intro.  Complete the DNA sequences. Try for full sync. Buy LOTS of shops.  Get Leonardo's weapons.  Buy the best weapons you can at the blacksmith.  Find all the Romulus Lairs. After you do that go to the Golden wolf sign to get the best armor and weapon in the game. Destroy Leonardo's War Machines. This is done by destroying the machine's blueprints and completing a challenge with the machine itself. Burn all the Borgia towers. This is done by killing the Borgia Captain, climbing to the top of the tower, and igniting it. Solve all of Subject 16's puzzles. After this you will appear in a red wireframe world. Just keep going to the end and collecting the items until a cutscene occurs. Collect all of the feathers. This is done by purchasing a feather map, collecting the feather symbols, and putting all ten in the shiny box at the Tiber Island Hideout. Collect all the flags. This is done by buying a flag map in each of the regions, collecting those symbols, and searching in the Lairs and War Machine Areas for them. Get gold on all of the Animus Challenges.  Get to level 50 in Multiplayer.  Get every other trophy.
